archimate:Requirement.name: PM.1.1.1: Applicants for employment (including part-time employees, consultants, contractors and temporary staff) should be screened (and vetted where legal) prior to commencing work (e.g. by taking up references, checking career history/qualifications and confirming identity, such as by inspecting a passport).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
